alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Dawson; Furnas; Gosper; Harlan; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 12:07AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Phelps, southwestern Buffalo, Gosper, southeastern Dawson, northeastern Furnas and northwestern Harlan Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1207 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Elm Creek to near Edison. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Elm Creek around 1215 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Odessa, Amherst, Atlanta, Holdrege and Riverdale. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 235 and 268. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buffalo; Dawson; Furnas; Gosper; Harlan; Phelps
